content: iswoolishcrochet dimensions 17cm x 9cm 7 x 3 5 materials crochet hook 5 mm us h-8 used yarn name paintbox yarns recycled ribbon type super chunky all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com iswoolishcrochet quantity about 48 meters 52 yds of main color and very small q-ty of additional color used for tail pattern uses usa terms slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet main part row 1 make chain of 17 stitches starting from the second chain stitch make slip_stitch 1 sc1 hdc1 dc10 hdc1 sc1 slip_stitch 1 turn totally you should receive 16 stitches row 2-20 crochet into back loop ch1 hereandafter used to start the row slip_stitch 1 sc1 hdc1 dc10 hdc1 sc1 slip_stitch 1 turn totally you should receive 16 stitches finished crocheting join two sides by by slip_stitch from the wrong side all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com iswoolishcrochet turn over and close the bottom pathing yarn tail through each front loop looking at you clothe the hole pulling the yarn tail fix it from the wrong side stuff your pumpkin by toy stuffing - all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com iswoolishcrochet put pumpkin tail inside and fix the top all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com iswoolishcrochet tail row 1 make chain of 13 stitches starting from the second chain stitch make sc12 turn row 2-3 ch1 sc12 turn finished crocheting join two sides by tapestry needle all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com iswoolishcrochet video tutorial is available here https //www instagram com/tv/cgc1vavq1yu/ igshid=6e23ujn9w8hv all rights reserved © copyright 2020 iswoolish by tatiana zuccalà e-mail tatiana zuccala@gmail com
